Walked in at 11:10, the host/owner looked down for about 5 minutes before I approached myself.  Was told kitchen is closed, none of the hours on yelp suggested such.  Asked for food nearby in catalan and spanish.  He told me no, it's late.  There are 2 restaurants next door.  He had no interest in or care that I took a taxi 20 minutes to get there to try his place.  Not very tourist friendly,  even if you can speak basic spanish.
